item.title: Telangana: Three die in separate accidents in different districts
item.description:
<![CDATA[Telangana: Three die in separate accidents in different districts
In Warangal district, a private bus drier G Mahendar (32) was returning home after attending a wedding, when he lost control of his motorcycle and fell. He died on the spot.
By Telangana Today Published Date - 24 February 2025, 12:16 PM
Representational Image.
Hyderabad: Three persons died in different road accidents in Warangal, Gadwal and Sircilla districts of Telangana on Monday, according to reports reaching here.
In Wara...]]>
item.author: Telangana Today
